task.title:
Adding an Address on Mypack Portal How to Add an Address on Your Mypack Account
You Must Have a Mypack Portal Account to Access
Select your student homepage
Select the "Personal Information" tile
Add your address under the desired category
If no address is defined, select the "Add" button under the desired category
Entering Your Address
select the "Copy From" button to copy the address from address that is already on record
Or, manually enter an address in the given fields if none is on record
Select the green "Save" button
